snippet: A legal victory for the man known widely by those initials: Dominique Strauss-Kahn, the French politician and former head of the International Monetary Fund.
abstract: Belgian court orders newly opened sex club called the DSK to change its name; ruling is another legal victory for the man known widely by those initials, Dominique Strauss-Kahn, French politician and former head of the International Monetary Fund who faced charges, later dropped, of sexually assaulting a hotel housekeeper in New York in 2011.

byline.contributor: Scott Sayare contributed reporting from Paris.

lead_paragraph: A legal victory for the man known widely by those initials: Dominique Strauss-Kahn, the French politician and former head of the International Monetary Fund.

headline.main: Find Another Name, Belgian Court Tells DSK Sex Club
headline.print_headline: Find Another Name, Belgian Court Tells DSK Sex Club
